description: Data for Minecraft Java Edition addons.

targets.description: A list of render targets. It doesn't really matter what name you give them, but it is necessary for specifying the intarget and outtarget of a render pass.

anyOf.description: The name of a render target. The size defaults to screen resolution.

name.description: The name of the render target to add.

width.description: The width of the render target.

height.description: The height of the render target.

name.description: The name of a program shader to apply on the input and post into the output. Use "blit" to copy the data from intarget to outtarget.

intarget.description: The name of a render target to use as an input. Use minecraft:main to specify the main screen.

outtarget.description: The name of a render target to output to. It should not be the same as intarget. Use minecraft:main to specify the main screen.

name.description: The auxiliary target's name that is passed into the "Program" JSON.

id.description: The auxiliary target's id. Either points into the name of a buffer that is defined in targets or into the location of a texture under assets/<namespace>/textures/effect (use a namespaced id to reference it).

width.description: Required if id references a texture. Describes the width of the texture in pixels.

height.description: Required if id references a texture. Describes the height of the texture in pixels.

bilinear.description: Required if id references a texture. Determines whether the scaling algorithm used for the image is bilinear or nearest neighbour.

uniforms.description: A list of overrides that change the values in the uniforms list in the "Program" JSON.

name.description: The name of the field that should be changed.

values.description: The values that the field should be changed to.
